review: The Amazon Fire TV box was easy to set up. Interface is responsive and intuitive. Performance of streaming content (on 15Mbps wireless) hasn't been as good as I had hoped. Amazon content seems to play back the best; other sources, such as PBS / PBS Kids / Pluto, have produced a lot of lag.  Directly connecting to ethernet seems to improve this, so it could be a connection issue -- but Amazon content does seem to be better optimized.Jury is still out on the remote. It has failed to wake up the box from sleep 2x; requiring me to unplug and reconnect to wake it up. Nice that you can also control with the Amazon Fire TV app for Android and iOS (among other Amazon devices).  I'll update this review as time goes on.
